summary: Completed testing of multi-provider email support and branding customization features. Backend APIs working correctly (16/19 tests passed), but frontend login issue prevents comprehensive UI testing. All email provider configurations, branding settings, and theme customization APIs functional.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Test email fails with SMTP configuration errors
flaky_endpoints.impact: Test email functionality not working with current SMTP settings

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Status code inconsistency, but security works

integration_issues.issue: Admin login credentials work via API but fail through UI form

passed_tests: Public settings endpoint returns branding data (no auth required)
Admin settings endpoint returns all email and branding fields
Branding settings update works (company name, tagline, logo, colors)
Theme mode updates work (dark, light, system)
Public settings reflect updated branding values
Settings fields present in API responses
Color and theme customization API working
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend login form integration. Admin credentials (admin@company.com / admin123) work via API but fail through UI form submission. This prevents testing of Settings UI components including email provider dropdown, SMTP fields, branding forms, theme selection, and color picker functionality.
